channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Traffic Light, 29th May
item.description:
Reported in January, still not working! It is now May. 4 months! Coming from race course towards Prestbury left hand side.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 209, New Barn Lane, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: Broken slabs, 29th May
item.description:
On the corner of feddon close by no. 22 Armstrong road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Feddon Close, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The rainwater is not draining as the drainage point is blocked with debris, 29th May
item.description:
The drainage point is on the southwest corner area of Suffolk Road and Bath Road junction just outside the new Cape Homes development (was HSBC). The road is flooding and pedestrians are getting soaked by spray from passing traffic.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Suffolk Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Kerb damaged and drain corner is exposed, 29th May
item.description:
On the corner of the second round about on new barn lane

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8a, New Barn Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
